trans-unit.source: Defines custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.
trans-unit.target: 定义自定义属性所共有的数据点、 序列和空点。

trans-unit.source: This class defines custom properties such as colors, the use of background images, hatching, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义如颜色、 背景图像、 阴影，等使用的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> property are all derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>类、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>类和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A>属性都派生自此类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> class with the specified series and custom properties flag.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref>与指定的序列和自定义属性标志的类。

trans-unit.source: The series that the data point belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 数据点所属系列。

trans-unit.source: A flag that indicates whether this is a data point custom property.
trans-unit.target: 一个标志，指示这是否是一种数据点自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置序列或空点的数据点的 x 轴标签的文本。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才会使用自定义标签尚未指定为相关<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the axis label for a data point, series or an empty point.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的数据点，系列或空点的轴标签。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set at run time for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以在运行时设置此属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object, all of its data points will use this label.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>对象时，其所有数据点的将使用此标签。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: If the AxisLabel property is not set and a custom label has not been specified, an axis label will be generated automatically using the axis scale.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置的 AxisLabel 属性，并且尚未指定自定义标签，将使用轴刻度自动生成轴标签。

trans-unit.source: Empty point labels are set using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用设置空点标签<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the text of the X-axis label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示 x 轴标签的文本的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置背景渐变样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value that is used to draw the background gradient style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>枚举值，用于绘制背景渐变样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatching style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置背景阴影样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value that is used to draw the background hatching style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>枚举值，用于绘制背景阴影样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the background image file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示背景图像文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the background image, which is used with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与一起使用的背景图像的对齐方式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the alignment of the background image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>枚举值，指定背景图像的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置背景图像绘制时将替换透明颜色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be replaced with a transparent color when the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>绘制图像时将替换透明颜色的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置背景图像绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that defines the drawing mode of the image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>枚举值，该值定义图像绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary background color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置辅助背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the secondary background color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值指定辅助背景色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the border color of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值指定数据点的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the border style of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>枚举值，指定数据点的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that specifies the border width of the data point.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，该值指定数据点的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is used to draw the color of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用于绘制数据点的颜色的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom properties of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Custom properties can be specified in the following format: AttrName1=Value1, AttrName2=Value2 …
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性可以指定以下格式︰ AttrName1 = Value1、 AttrName2 = Value2...

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the custom properties of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示数据点的自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the extended custom properties of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的扩展自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Extended custom properties can be specified in the following format: AttrName1=Value1, AttrName2=Value2...
trans-unit.target: 可以采用以下格式指定扩展的自定义属性︰ AttrName1 = Value1、 AttrName2 = Value2...

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomProperties"></xref> object that represents the extended custom properties of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomProperties"> </xref>表示数据点的扩展自定义属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the data point custom property with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 删除具有指定名称的数据点自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的字体。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> value that represents the font of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>值，该值表示数据点的字体。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data point custom property with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有指定名称的数据点自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the data point custom property with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示具有指定名称的数据点自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the requested property is not set, the default custom property of the data series will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置请求的属性，将返回的数据序列的默认自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a custom property with the specified name was set.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否已设置具有指定名称的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the custom property to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的自定义属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the custom property was set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设置的自定义属性;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to show the value of the data point on the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否在标签上显示的数据点的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the data point is shown on the label; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据点的值，显示在标签;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the item is shown in the legend.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否在图例中显示项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is shown in the legend; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果项显示在图例;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> object by its position in the index.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref>按其位置在索引中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The index of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the custom properties of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示数据点的自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> object by name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref>按名称的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the custom properties of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示数据点的自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点标签的文本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the text of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示数据点标签的文本的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点标签的角度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the angle of the label.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示标签的角度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点标签的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值表示数据点标签的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点标签的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the border color of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值表示数据点标签的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the border style of the label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>枚举值，指定标签的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the width of the border.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text color of the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the text color of the label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值表示标签的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format of the data point label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点标签的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the format of the label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示标签的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip for the data point label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点标签的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip for the data point label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示数据点标签的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the item in the legend.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在图例中项的文本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the text of the item in the legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示在图例中项的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip of the item in the legend.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在图例中项的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip of the item in the legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示图例中项的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the marker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标记的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the border color of the marker.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值表示标记的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the marker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标记的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that specifies the border width of the marker.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，该值指定标记的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the marker color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标记颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is used to draw the marker color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用于绘制标记颜色的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the marker image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标记图像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the marker image file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示标记图像文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置绘制标记图像时将替换透明颜色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值指定在绘制标记图像时将替换透明颜色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the marker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标记的大小。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that specifies the size of the marker.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，该值指定标记的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the marker style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的标记样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the marker style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"> </xref>枚举值，指定的标记样式。

trans-unit.source: Resets a custom property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义属性重置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Resets a custom property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义属性重置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom property of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 设置数据点的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default properties of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 设置数据点的默认属性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the previous property values must be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否必须清除以前的属性值。

trans-unit.source: If the `clearAll` parameter is set to `true`, all previous property values are cleared, otherwise they are not.
trans-unit.target: 如果`clearAll`参数设置为`true`，并清除所有以前的属性值，否则它们不。

trans-unit.source: A flag that indicates whether to clear previous property values.
trans-unit.target: 一个标志，指示是否清除以前的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示工具提示。
